item.title: Leaf clearing, 24th November
item.description:
Dear Southwark Council . Please note that the leaves at the front and rear of Brunswick Quay SE16 7PZ are still almost a foot deep in some places, and are a hazard to pedestrians, cyclists and cars alike. Please could you come back and clear this area off to reduce these hazards. Your attention is much appreciated. Southwark Resident

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brunswick Quay, Rotherhithe, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
